name: Heal and Tear
description:
Heal and Tear is a fast-paced shooter ready to satisfy your moments of feeling like wanting to kill some enemies in a hyper speed movement.

You will need to survive as much time as you can. Do you have what it takes to survive like anybody else? Then come here and... Heal and Tear.

This game was made during the My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 Game Jam.
